executiveSummary.introduction: Beneficial Group is a multi-faceted, mobile-first web platform designed to showcase and manage diversified operations in mining, transport, forestry, and agriculture across Cameroon and beyond. Built with Next.js 15, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS, it offers a seamless, scalable, and cost-effective digital experience for clients, partners, investors, and administrators.

keyValuePropositions.title: Cost-Effective
keyValuePropositions.description: Serverless architecture reduces operational costs by 80-90%

keyValuePropositions.title: Scalable
keyValuePropositions.description: Supabase scales from 0 to millions of users automatically

keyValuePropositions.title: Secure
keyValuePropositions.description: Enterprise-grade security with zero server management

keyValuePropositions.title: Community-Focused
keyValuePropositions.description: Mobile-first design ensures accessibility for local partners and communities

keyValuePropositions.title: Maintainable
keyValuePropositions.description: Feature-flag architecture for easy customization of each business vertical

keyValuePropositions.title: Sustainable
keyValuePropositions.description: A digital backbone to support eco-friendly and responsible business practices

table.Rationale: Modern SSR/SSG, App Router, React Server Components
Serverless, scalable, real-time, integrated auth & storage
Visual content management for all business verticals
Fast, global CDN, easy CI/CD, form handling
Custom forms for service requests, logistics, and inquiries
Secure, scalable management for project photos and documents
Direct chat, inquiries, and automated notifications
African and international payment support for services/products

whySupabase.title: Why Supabase?
points: No server management, no database ops, no patching
Generous free tier supports initial growth and community projects
Scales to millions of users, pay only for what you use
Real-time data for logistics tracking and project updates
Built-in authentication, storage, and RLS for secure data handling

featureFlagSystem.title: 3.1 Feature-Flag System
points: Central config (`features.config.ts`) enables/disables business verticals (mining, forestry, etc.).
Disabling a feature removes its UI, API, and admin controls, allowing for agile business scaling.
Feature modules are self-contained: UI, logic, Supabase rules, and tests are co-located.

supabaseIntegration.title: 3.2 Supabase Integration
points: PostgreSQL: All dynamic data (projects, service requests, users, content) stored in Supabase tables.
Supabase Auth: Email/password, phone, and social logins for clients, partners, and staff.
Supabase Storage: Media uploads (project photos, compliance docs, product images).
Edge Functions: Business logic for logistics notifications, report generation, and secure operations.
RLS (Row Level Security): Strict database rules enforce data access policies (e.g., a client can only see their own transport data).
Realtime: Live updates for fleet tracking, project status, and notifications.

securityImplementation.title: 6. Security Implementation
